scripts.build: pnpm --filter @zerocancer/shared build && pnpm --filter ./apps/backend build && pnpm --filter ./apps/frontend build
scripts.dev: pnpm --filter ./apps/backend prisma:generate && pnpm --filter @zerocancer/shared build && concurrently -c green,blue "pnpm backend:dev" "pnpm --filter ./apps/frontend dev"
scripts.build-backend: pnpm --filter @zerocancer/shared build && pnpm --filter ./apps/backend prisma:generate && pnpm --filter ./apps/backend build
scripts.start:production: cd apps/backend && pnpm dlx wrangler deploy
scripts.test:production: pnpm build:production && cd apps/backend && pnpm dlx wrangler dev
